page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF HELEN.
page.content: My name is Helen and I am nine years old. I live with my brother,mum and dad.We have just returned from Suadi Arabia. I have light-blonde hair,brown eyes and am one metre thirty four centimetres tall. For school I wear a green jumper,grey skirt and a white shirt.At home I wear jeans,a T-shirt and a blue jumper.My hobbies are Horseriding and Rollerskating.During the week,I get up and wash in time for breakfast at 08.15 and travel to school by car to arrive by 09.00.In school,we start with Assembly and prayers,during which I play the melodica.The remainder of the mornings is spent doing mathematics and English.During the afternoons we have geography,science,scripture,craft,hist ory,computer studies and sport.After school,I enjoy 'club',Brownies and watching television.
